text: Tolaba abo abaagambwa nti mulekere awo okulwana, era muyimirizeewo e sswala, era mutoole e Zakka, naye ate bwe baalagirwa okulwana, wagenda okulaba ng’abamu mu bo batya abantu, nga balinga abatya Katonda. Si nakindi n’okusingawo, nebagamba nti ayi Mukama Katonda waffe lwaki otulaaliseeko okulwana, singa otulindirizzaako okumala akaseera katono, gamba Ggwe (Nabbi Muhammad) nti ebyokweyagala kwensi byabutaliimu, era enkomerero yenungi eri atya Katonda, era nga temugenda kulyazamanyizibwa wadde omuwula gwe ntende
